metadata.name: Suspicious Network Command
metadata.comment: Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipconfig /all')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('netsh interface show interface')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('arp -a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nbtstat -n')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('net config')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('route print'))))

output.summary: Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrator, hotline ask to user Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1016/T1016.md#atomic-test-1---system-network-configuration-discovery-on-windows
